topics.body:
I was looking at Hatsune Miku in the Internet and then I found this "4koma manga":http://nagimiso.nobody.jp/mikuyon_tmp.html.
It was really good and I cried a bit too.

You guys should check it out.

(Also, take a good look at page 44. It's pretty mind blowing.)
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
So warning to the folks that use Tumblr. 

"Apparently Tumblr has a new auto-DMCA-filed audio post takedowns":http://stewardessme.tumblr.com/post/111011084075/dont-post-copyrighted-songs-on-tumblr-anymore

And you know what makes this shit bad? The fact that if you get three copyright strikes they will DELETE YOUR BLOG. 

Sound familiar doesn't it? That's right, this is the same bullshit Youtube pulls.

Fuck this. The moment they realize they don't need their consumers anymore the moment they Screw them over.

I'm hearing that a ton of Blogs have already been taken down as we speak thanks to this. 

I like how Tumblr has that little Save the internet button on the right side of the screen, and then they do this. 

This is merely just a warning for anyone that posts music on their tumblr, as much as I hate doing this you should avoid doing so. At least with Copyrighted music. 

I hear that if you only just Reblogged music you should be fine? Hopefully?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
